description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to turn themselves and anything they touch invisible. The user becomes an Invisible Human.

users.circumstances: Absalom consumed the fruit at an unknown point before the Thriller Bark arc

abilityReveals.description: Absalom fires an invisible bazooka blast at his opponents, making the attack difficult to see or dodge.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Absalom uses this attack on Lola when she tries to help Nami escape during the forced wedding ceremony.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
Invisibility can be countered by observation and environmental cues

strengths.strength: Complete invisibility of user and touched objects
strengths.description: The user can become completely invisible and make weapons or other objects invisible as well.
